modName: Nature Main Menu Replacer Now With Randomizer
summary:
Now you can have these choose between this 58 very cool nature wallpaper and inport them to your main menu in skyrim, it's very simple to install for anyone!

And you can learn how to make your very own backdrop by a few simple steps!
descriptionHtml:
[size=8][b]Nature Main Menu Replacer[/size]
Now with randomizer![/b]

[b]-[color=red]DESCRIPTION[/color]-[/b]

This mod come in three different files:

- Nature Main Menu Replacer With Randomizer (22 images)

- Nature Main Menu Replacer (58 images - Install manual)

- How To Make Your Own (Guide to make your own backdrop)

Images size are 1920 x 1080 and read carefully before asking questions.

Maker of the shots are Zimbi http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198057136689

Thanks to Hellstor102 for giving me permission to use the randomizer/mesh file, and i will mention that he spent a lot of time on that edited mesh file. You can use hellstorm102's mod and just add this mod wallpapers if you want or have it installed already!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708/?tab=3&navtag=/ajax/modimages/%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D3708

[b]-[color=red]INSTALLATION[/color]-[/b]

- There is a 'readme' in all files, read that.

[b]-[color=red]UNINSTALLATION[/color]-[/b]

- Read the 'readme'.

[b]-[color=red]CHANGE LOG[/color]-[/b]

v2.0 - 2013/01/12
-Add Randomizer file.
-Separated the 'How to make your own' from the main file.

v1.1 - 2013/01/07
- Edited readme file (Both).
- Add samples.

[b]-[color=red]CREDITS & THANKS[/color]-[/b]

- Hellstorm102 for giving me permission to use the randomizer and mesh file. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1535027
- Zimbi for the screenshots. http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198057136689
- Jack (r2weto) for being you.

[b]-[color=red]LEGAL/LICENSE/PERMISSION[/color]-[/b]

- Please PM me or send an e-mail with your permission requests.
author: SlightSith
